item.title: Why Regular Backups Are Essential for Your Website's Security
item.description: No matter the size of your business, a reliable backup strategy is essential for website security and business continuity. Unexpected threats like malware, hacking, or server failures can strike at any time. Hereâ€™s why regular backups are non-negotiable for any website owner.
